name: part_008
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ3周年記念LIVE】MIX2 - 私の居場所 - 【3DLIVE】 [knb_mosTUvo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Oozora Subaru performing 'Taiyou Shoujo'.
Transition screen and introduction for the next guest, Ookami Mio.
Ookami Mio and Tokoyami Towa performing 'Howling'.

subtitles.original: ギラギラの太陽さ！
subtitles.english: I'm a dazzling sun!

subtitles.original: 欲張っていっちゃいます！
subtitles.english: I'm going to be greedy!

subtitles.original: あれもしたい！ これもしたい！
subtitles.english: I want to do that! I want to do this!

subtitles.original: レッツ サマータイム！
subtitles.english: Let's summer time!

subtitles.original: NEXT GUEST
subtitles.english: NEXT GUEST

subtitles.original: HOLOLIVE GAMERS
subtitles.english: HOLOLIVE GAMERS

subtitles.original: 大神ミオ / OOKAMI MIO
subtitles.english: Ookami Mio

subtitles.original: 静寂に響いてよ My howling
subtitles.english: Let it echo in the silence, my howling

subtitles.original:
Howling
作詞・作曲：ZAQ / 編曲：KanadeYUK
subtitles.english:
Howling
Lyrics & Composition: ZAQ / Arrangement: KanadeYUK

subtitles.original: 滔々と流れていく風景
subtitles.english: The scenery that flows on and on

subtitles.original: 刹那的な日々の中で
subtitles.english: In these ephemeral days

subtitles.original: 差し伸べられた手は優しく
subtitles.english: The hand reached out was gentle

subtitles.original: 鼓動に滴る微熱の予感
subtitles.english: A premonition of a slight fever dripping into my heartbeat

subtitles.original: 風に逆らう
subtitles.english: Against the wind

subtitles.original: そう生きてきたから
subtitles.english: That's how I've lived

subtitles.original: 君に会って気付く
subtitles.english: Meeting you made me realize

subtitles.original: 「もう独りじゃない」
subtitles.english: “I'm not alone anymore”

subtitles.original: 灼光 瞬きを越え 描き 月へ響く
subtitles.english: Burning light, crossing over the blinking, drawing and echoing to the moon

subtitles.original: 爪弾く道 金瞳の群れ 共に嘆く夜
subtitles.english: A strumming path, a pack of golden eyes, a night where we mourn together

subtitles.original: 慟哭 伝播する想いは心強くする
subtitles.english: Wailing, the spreading feelings make us stronger

subtitles.original: ついておいでよ
subtitles.english: Come with me

subtitles.original: 後ろに君がいるから 私は迷わない
subtitles.english: Because you are behind me, I won't hesitate

subtitles.original: 光射す道へ
subtitles.english: To the path where the light shines

subtitles.original: 無力だだから 仲間を求め
subtitles.english: Because I'm powerless, I seek companions

subtitles.original: 凍えるから 火を灯して
subtitles.english: Because I'm freezing, light a fire

subtitles.original: 変化とともに 進化していく
subtitles.english: Evolving along with the changes

subtitles.original: この結末は だれも知らない
subtitles.english: This ending, no one knows

subtitles.original: 君を信じる そう決めているから
subtitles.english: I believe in you, because I've decided so

subtitles.original: どんな異常・非日常も
subtitles.english: No matter how strange or unusual

subtitles.original: 乗り越えられるよ
subtitles.english: We can overcome it

subtitles.original: 月光 この闇に唯一 凛と咲く華
subtitles.english: Moonlight, the only flower blooming with dignity in this darkness

subtitles.original: 恐れなのか 憧れなのか 向かい合う夜空
subtitles.english: Is it fear or longing? The night sky we face

subtitles.original: 大地を駆け抜ける私と君が創り出す
subtitles.english: You and I, running through the earth, will create

subtitles.original: この物語 単純未来じゃない 湧き立つ情熱
subtitles.english: This story, not a simple future, but a surging passion

subtitles.original: この声に乗せよう
subtitles.english: Let's put it in this voice

subtitles.original: 空飛ぶ羽根なくても 手は繋げられたから
subtitles.english: Even without wings to fly, we were able to hold hands

subtitles.original: この運命を選んだ
subtitles.english: So I chose this destiny

subtitles.original: 鼓動する遠吠えは 静寂に響いて
subtitles.english: The pulsating howl echoes in the silence

subtitles.original: 何度も何度も その絆を確かめあった
subtitles.english: Over and over again, we confirmed that bond

subtitles.original: 瞬きを越え 描き 月へ響く
subtitles.english: Crossing over the blinking, drawing and echoing to the moon

subtitles.original: 爪弾く道 金瞳の群れ 共に嘆く夜
subtitles.english: A strumming path, a pack of golden eyes, a night where we mourn together

subtitles.original: 慟哭 伝播する想いは心強くする
subtitles.english: Wailing, the spreading feelings make us stronger

subtitles.original: 共にいこうよ
subtitles.english: Let's go together

subtitles.original: 隣に君がいるから 私は迷わない
subtitles.english: Because you are beside me, I won't hesitate

subtitles.original: 光射す道へ
subtitles.english: To the path where the light shines

subtitles.original: Listen to my howling...
subtitles.english: Listen to my howling...

subtitles.original: 鼓動が止まることはない
subtitles.english: The heartbeat will never stop

subtitles.original:
大切フォトグラフ
作詞：篠崎あやと / 作曲・編曲：本多友紀 (Arte Refact)
subtitles.english:
Taisetsu Photograph
Lyrics: Ayato Shinozaki / Composition & Arrangement: Yuki Honda (Arte Refact)

subtitles.original: 見慣れきったドアの先に
subtitles.english: Beyond the familiar door

subtitles.original: 変わらない微笑み
subtitles.english: An unchanging smile
